column4: I'm having trouble restoring Grub. It says do "find /boot/grub/stage1" but the Grub installation I want to fix is on a USB hard drive (/media/disk) and when I do "find /media/disk/boot/grub/stage1" I get file not found (but the file exists...)
The find you want is not prefixed with /media/disk as there is no mounting yet
Each disk will be treated as beginging at /
